dc:title: Things Worth Fighting For?" (Letter
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: War does not defend faith but rather affluence. Harshly criticizes those who speak of a Christian heroism in war and states that America is not a Christian nation, and should confront its hypocrisy.
